Package popt4jlib.NumberPartitioning

Package defines parallel/distributed versions of well-known Number Partitioning algorithms.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FNPTask
    class implements the CKK algorithm (Complete Karmarkar-Karp Algorithm) for 2-way Number Partitioning, due to Richard Korf (1997).
    FNPTask2
    class implements the CKK algorithm (Complete Karmarkar-Karp Algorithm) for 2-way Number Partitioning, due to Richard Korf (1997).
    FNPTask2Pool
    implements a stack-based thread-local pool of FNPTask2 objects.
    FNPTask2ThreadLocalPools
    auxiliary class using the ThreadLocal mechanism to create thread-local FNPTask2 object pools.
    FNPTask3
    class implements the CKK algorithm (Complete Karmarkar-Karp Algorithm) for 2-way Number Partitioning, due to Richard Korf (1997).
    FNPTask3Pool
    implements a stack-based thread-local pool of FNPTask3 objects.
    FNPTask3ThreadLocalPools
    auxiliary class using the ThreadLocal mechanism to create thread-local FNPTask3 object pools.
    FNPTaskPool
    implements a thread-local pool of FNPTask objects.
    FNPTaskThreadLocalPools
    auxiliary class using the ThreadLocal mechanism to create thread-local FNPTask object pools.
    NPTask
    class implements the CKK algorithm (Complete Karmarkar-Karp Algorithm) for 2-way Number Partitioning, due to Richard Korf (1997).
    ReleaseFNPTask2Object
    Encapsulates the requirement for calling the release() method of the FNPTask2 object, from a specific thread (the one that created the FNPTask2 object that it holds, as well as the object itself).
    ReleaseFNPTask2ObjectPool
    implements a thread-local pool of ReleaseFNPTask2Object objects.
    ReleaseFNPTask2ObjectThreadLocalPools
    auxiliary class using the ThreadLocal mechanism to create thread-local ReleaseFNPTask2Object object pools.
    ReleaseFNPTaskObject
    Encapsulates the requirement for calling the release() method of the PoolableObjectIntf interface, from a specific thread (the one that created the FNPTask object that it holds, as well as the object itself).
    ReleaseFNPTaskObjectPool
    implements a thread-local pool of ReleaseFNPTaskObject objects.
    ReleaseFNPTaskObjectThreadLocalPools
    auxiliary class using the ThreadLocal mechanism to create thread-local ReleaseFNPTaskObject object pools.

Package popt4jlib.NumberPartitioning Description

Package defines parallel/distributed versions of well-known Number Partitioning algorithms. Number Partitioning is NP-complete and is known to exhibit a phase-transition when m (the number of bits of each number in the list) approximately equals n (the number of numbers in the list to be partitioned).

Package Specification

A multi-threaded and a distributed version of the Complete Karmarkar-Karp (CKK) algorithm is implemented as specified by Korf (1997).
